value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Valentine23,Face|Oh, Lord Takumi! Have you seen
Lady Sakura here, by chance?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エルフィ,ch05_20_Elfi_F_Valentine23,Face|And Lady Elise. Have you seen Lady
Elise anywhere, Prince Takumi?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Valentine23,Face|Hm. Sakura and Elise are missing?
I haven't seen either one...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Valentine23,Face|We looked all over the festival
grounds, and they were nowhere
to be found. I'm just so worried!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Valentine23,Face|You worry too much. Can't people
step away from the festivities for
a little while?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エルフィ,ch05_20_Elfi_F_Valentine23,Face|Not Lady Elise. She has a love for
entertainment and festivities that
won't allow her to miss out on this!$k$pIf she's been gone this long, then
surely something serious has
happened to her.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Valentine23,Face|I will...pray for their safe return.$k$p$Sbs150|
